businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî Singapore-based global internet company
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a Singapore-headquartered global technology company operating three core businesses across Southeast Asia, Latin America, and Taiwan: e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee, formerly SeaMoney). TTM 2025 revenue of $21.04B (+35.8% YoY) with net income of $1.42B, achieving a full profitability turnaround. Expanded strategic AI partnership MOU with Google on 2/19, driving AI innovation across e-commerce, gaming, and fintech. Q4 2025 earnings scheduled for 3/3.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce commissions, advertising revenue, logistics (SPX Express) fees ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: Free Fire and other in-game virtual item sales, publishing revenue ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2% YoY), bookings $775M (+51% YoY)
Monee (formerly SeaMoney): Digital payments (ShopeePay), consumer/SME lending (SPayLater), digital banking (SeaBank), insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8% YoY)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Latin America (2024 Southeast Asia GMV 52%, up from 48%)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale game (Q3 2025 bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay ‚Äî Digital payment and financial services platform (loan balance $7.9B, +70% YoY; Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia and Philippines

keyMetrics.name: Revenue (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: +35.8% YoY. All three core businesses in high growth

keyMetrics.name: Net Income (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Full turnaround from losses to profitability

keyMetrics.name: P/E (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Reasonable given growth rate. Forward basis expected to be lower

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth (YoY)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Accelerating from FY2024's 28.8%. Led by Shopee and Monee

keyMetrics.name: Operating Income
keyMetrics.interpretation: 2.6x improvement from FY2024's $662M. Economies of scale achieved

keyMetrics.name: Shopee GMV (Q3)
keyMetrics.interpretation: 5th consecutive record quarter. 52% Southeast Asia e-commerce share

keyMetrics.name: Monee Loan Balance
keyMetrics.interpretation: NPL at stable 1.1%. Targeting 450M unbanked Southeast Asian population

keyMetrics.name: Market Cap
keyMetrics.interpretation: 3x revenue. Reasonable valuation among Southeast Asian tech leaders

growthDrivers.title: Shopee E-Commerce Dominance Expanding ‚Äî 2024 Southeast Asia GMV 52%
growthDrivers.description: Southeast Asia e-commerce GMV share rose to 52% in 2024 (from 48% prior year, +4pp). Shopee captured $12B of $14B total new GMV. Q3 2025 GMV $32.2B (+28% YoY), 5th consecutive record. Ad revenue +70% YoY. Brazil showing profitability turnaround signals with commission rate increases.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI Strategic Partnership ‚Äî Agentic Shopping Prototype, AP2 Payment Protocol
growthDrivers.description: Expanded MOU with Google signed 2/19. Shopee: Gemini-based Agentic Shopping prototype development. Garena: AI-powered game development innovation. Monee: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) adoption. OpenAI tools also being integrated in parallel.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (Fintech) Hypergrowth ‚Äî Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 revenue +60.8% YoY, loan balance $7.9B (+70% YoY), 90-day NPL stable at 1.1%. Active lending users surpassed 28M. Off-Shopee SPayLater (payments outside Shopee) +300% YoY, evolving into independent fintech platform.

growthDrivers.title: Garena/Free Fire Bookings Rebound ‚Äî IP Collaboration Strategy Succeeding
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 bookings $775M (+51% YoY), highest quarter since 2021. IP collaborations with Squid Game, Naruto improved per-user bookings by 40%.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: Integrated ecosystem spanning Southeast Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech is the core competitive advantage. Cross-synergies between Shopee, Monee, and Garena plus in-house logistics network (SPX Express) create entry barriers. 2024 GMV 52% vs #2 TikTok Shop (~18%) ‚Äî dominant lead.

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network and SPX Express logistics network create powerful network effects. 2024 Southeast Asia GMV 52%.
E-commerce (Shopee) ‚Üí Payments (ShopeePay) ‚Üí Finance (Monee) ‚Üí Entertainment (Garena) super app ecosystem. Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY.
Language, payment, logistics, and regulatory optimization across 11 Southeast Asian markets. Strong local advantage vs Temu and Amazon.
Integrated utilization of e-commerce, payment, lending, and gaming data for AI personalization. Further strengthened by Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: Southeast Asia e-commerce #2, GMV share ~17.6-18% (2024). Strong in live commerce.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: Declined to Southeast Asia e-commerce #3. Overtaken by TikTok Shop. Continuing to lose share to Shopee.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-price cross-border e-commerce. Entering Southeast Asia and Brazil. MAU +55% surge.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: Latin America #1 e-commerce and fintech. Direct competition with Shopee in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: Southeast Asian super app. Indirect competition with Monee in fintech.

recentNews.headline: SE Stock Down -3.71% (-$4.13) ‚Äî Broad Market Weakness
recentNews.significance: Declining alongside tech selloff. Volatility increasing ahead of 3/3 Q4 earnings.

recentNews.headline: Strategic AI Partnership MOU Expanded with Google ‚Äî Agentic Shopping, AP2
recentNews.significance: Gemini AI integration across e-commerce, gaming, and fintech. Long-term competitiveness enhanced.

recentNews.headline: Morgan Stanley Cuts SE Target to $173 from $209, Maintains Overweight
recentNews.significance: Near-term margin pressure concerns reflected, but long-term growth view maintained.

recentNews.headline: Q3 2025 Earnings ‚Äî Revenue $6.0B (+38% YoY), Shopee GMV $32.2B Record
recentNews.significance: All three businesses in high growth. Profitability turnaround confirmed.

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 Earnings Report Scheduled (8 Days Away)
recentNews.significance: Shopee holiday season results, Monee growth sustainability, and 2026 guidance are key.

analystOpinions.notableComment: 'Strong Buy' consensus among 12 analysts. Average target $189.41 (+76.8%). Morgan Stanley Overweight $173. Even lowest target of $144 is +34% above current price. Zero sell ratings.

risks.title: Intensifying Competition from Temu and TikTok Shop
risks.description: Temu MAU +55%, TikTok Shop expanding live commerce. Increased costs to defend Shopee's market share could pressure margins.

risks.title: Q4 Earnings Report (3/3) Risk
risks.description: Holiday season results, Brazil profitability turnaround, and 2026 guidance are key. Further decline possible if expectations missed.

risks.title: Southeast Asian Macroeconomic Slowdown
risks.description: Global economic slowdown could dampen Southeast Asian consumer spending. Direct impact on e-commerce and fintech growth rates.

risks.title: Fintech Credit Risk
risks.description: Loan balance $7.9B (+70% YoY) growing rapidly. NPL stable at 1.1% but could spike in economic downturn.

risks.title: Regulatory Risk ‚Äî Evolving Southeast Asian Regulations
risks.description: Like Indonesia's TikTok Shop regulation, individual countries could strengthen e-commerce and fintech regulations.

buyReasons.title: Zero Sell Ratings ‚Äî +77% Upside to Target
buyReasons.rationale: 0 sells among 12 analysts. Even lowest target of $144 is +34% above current price. Market appears excessively discounting.

buyReasons.title: 52% Southeast Asia E-Commerce Share ‚Äî Dominant #1
buyReasons.rationale: Shopee GMV at record highs for 5 consecutive quarters. Captured $12B of $14B new GMV. Monopolistic market position.

buyReasons.title: Monee Fintech Hypergrowth ‚Äî 450M Unbanked Population
buyReasons.rationale: Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY. Evolving into independent fintech platform, dramatically expanding TAM.

buyReasons.title: Google AI Partnership ‚Äî Long-Term Competitive Innovation
buyReasons.rationale: Gemini-based Agentic Shopping, AP2 payment protocol. AI-driven personalization expected to improve conversion rates and ARPU.

overallOpinion: Sea Limited is core infrastructure for Southeast Asia's digital economy. Shopee's 52% share, Monee's +60.8% growth, Free Fire bookings +51% ‚Äî all three businesses showing strong growth.
The expanded Google AI partnership is a catalyst for long-term competitive strengthening. Agentic Shopping and AP2 protocol could drive next-generation innovation in e-commerce and fintech.
Technically below both 50-day ($122) and 200-day ($153) SMAs in a bearish zone. RSI 42, neutral-to-bearish. $100 support test possible.

All analysts rate buy/hold with average target +77% upside. Q4 earnings on 3/3 could be the catalyst. P/S 3x is attractive given 35%+ growth. Worth considering dollar-cost averaging at current levels as a long-term bet on Southeast Asia's digital economy.

sources.name: Yahoo Finance
sources.description: Morgan Stanley target cut and long-term outlook
